abstract.p: Earth Friendly offers hand-printed paper lampshades for use with bare bulbs; photo (Currents column) (S)

block.p: Bare budget? Not to worry. You can dress a bare bulb with 10 patterned, hand-printed paper shades from a kit called Futuralightz by Earth Friendly. It allows you to create summery hanging lampshades quickly and easily with one wooden clothespin, which is provided. The paper shades, 11 inches high, are safe to use with a 40-watt bulb, the company says, if you use a plastic bulb protector (also included). Futuralightz is made in Germany; each kit costs $25 at the expanded Mxyplyzyk, 125 Greenwich Avenue (13th Street).
